answers.answer: Hi! That's awesome. I had preeclampsia with my first too, a boy. And now I'm 14 weeks with my second who We believe is a Girl and I'm nervous about the possibility of getting it again. But knowing you didn't get it again is a relief. I Hope I'm lucky and don't get it :)
I had my daughter last yr in jan. N now I'm 29 weeks 5 days pregnant with my son:)...I'm excited also!!
I thought for sure I was going to have it! But, don't give up hope. :) I'm a testimony of that now! I bet you won't have it again. ;)

question: I had preeclampsia with my first pregnancy a little over two years ago. Well, I am now pregnant with my second and they were suspecting that I had preeclampsia once again due to some high blood pressure.Just found out.... My blood pressure is normal and I am preeclampsia free! They are gonna keep an eye on us, of course, but what a relief that was to hear! After having had a 4 pound preemie due to preeclampsia, it is such a blessing to know I won't be having it with this one!Also, just found out I am expecting a little mister. :) Already have my girl, so I'm excited to have a little man on the way! Anyone else have a girl and now are having a boy? Anyone else excited about seeing all the differences between the two?I'm just so happy. :)
title: So relieved and happy. :)
